item.title: How to build Website like this?
item.description: Hello World! for building this site I used hugo and markdown. github used as my host for my website. What is markdown? Markdown is a lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax.Markdown is often used to format readme files, for writing messages in online discussion forums, and to create rich text using a plain text editor. markdown is easy to use and for syntax you can use this website
